articles.author: Tsuyoshi Inajima
articles.title: Oil Extends Decline as Saudi Arabia, Russia Signal Output Boost
articles.description: Oil headed for its longest run of losses since February as investors weighed Saudi Arabia and Russia’s proposal to boost output to ease concerns over supply shortages.

articles.author: Raf Casert
articles.title: European Union proposes ban on plastic products in attempt to reduce pollution
articles.description: The European Union has proposed banning plastic products like cotton buds, straws, stirs and balloon sticks when alternatives are easily available in an attempt to reduce litter spoiling beaches and ocean beds.

articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: Canada likely to buy Trans Mountain pipeline project: Bloomberg
articles.description: Canada is likely to buy Kinder Morgan Canada Ltd's Trans Mountain oil pipeline and its proposed expansion project in an attempt to ensure that it is built, Bloomberg reported on Monday, citing a person familiar with the talks.

articles.author: Anumeha Chaturvedi
articles.title: Data breach: Hospitality sector yet to comply with GDPR
articles.description: Barring chains such as Taj and The Leela, very few seem to have updated their privacy policies and terms of agreements complying with the GDPR regulations.

articles.title: Jeff Bezos Details Plan to Make Blue Origin the Amazon of the Moon

articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: California rolls out digital license plate pilot program
articles.description: California cars will soon be spotted with digital license plates as part of a pilot project.

articles.title: Serge Dassault, French aircraft magnate, dies at 93
articles.description: The billionaire politician and businessman inherited an aviation empire from his aircraft-designer father.

articles.author: Alanna Petroff
articles.title: Two of the world's biggest brands are now Chinese
articles.description: The 2018 list of the world's most valuable brands is out, and many Americans may not recognize a couple: China's Alibaba and Tencent.

articles.author: Hannah Kramer
articles.title: Hormel recalls more than 200000 pounds of Spam
articles.description: The U.S. Department of Agriculture said Hormel canned pork and chicken products may be "contaminated with foreign matter, specifically pieces of metal."

articles.author: Ravi Baichwal
articles.title: Local coffee shops see opportunity in Starbucks' Tuesday afternoon closure
articles.description: Independent coffee houses in Chicago are trying to use the Starbucks incident as a teachable moment.

articles.title: Truckers' Strike Paralyzes Brazil as President Courts Investors
articles.description: Brazil, which has Latin America’s largest economy, has been crippled as truck drivers protesting rising fuel prices have blocked roads across the country.

articles.author: Elizabeth Elizalde
articles.title: Angry customer threatens to send Jack in the Box worker to Mexico after coupon argument
articles.description: An angry customer at a Texas Jack in the Box restaurant was caught on video threatening to send a female employee to Mexico .

articles.author: Julia Horowitz
articles.title: Ivanka Trump granted seven new trademarks in China
articles.description: Ethics experts say this raises conflict-of-interest concerns.

articles.author: Pam Kragen
articles.title: San Diego's best burgers
articles.description: Today is national hamburger day. If you're not grillin' then get to eatin' one of these 60 great burgers in a neighborhood near you

articles.author: Edward Taylor
articles.title: Germany grills Daimler boss over extent of Vito van emissions fix
articles.description: Germany's Transport Ministry quizzed Daimler Chief Executive Dieter Zetsche on Monday over how many Mercedes-Benz vans and cars need to be fixed after a regulator said it had found illegal software in one of its models.

articles.author: Chelsea Robinson
articles.title: Police: Video shows man throwing hot coffee in face of McDonald's manager
articles.description: ​The coffee, which could have been 170 degrees, caused severe burns to the woman's face and neck.

articles.author: Aayush Jindal
articles.title: Ripple Price Analysis: XRP/USD Under Bearish Pressure
articles.description: Ripple price is clearly under pressure against the US Dollar and Bitcoin. XRP/USD may well accelerate declines below $0.6000 in the near term.

articles.title: Oil sinks while global stocks gain on North Korea, euro shaken by Italy
articles.description: U.S. oil futures sank to six-week lows on Monday on expectations that major producers may raise output, while Asian stocks and U.S. share futures gained on signs the United States and North Korea were still working towards holding a summit.  The euro bounced …

articles.author: Kirk Spano
articles.title: Remembering Smart Bank Regulation (Macro Monday)
articles.description: Dodd-Frank rollback more ideological than effective. Midsize banks could become next crisis. Largest banks get a break too.
